entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Island Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 20 this morning then rising. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow this morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. Temperature falling to minus 20 this morning then rising. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022
